tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Meeta Malik is an awesome dentist and I say this for multiple reasons
1. Very friendly and puts you at ease very naturally, very professionally.
2. Many doctors seem to assume that you know what to pay and will be ok with paying for subsequent sessions etc. Dr. Malik is very transparent and makes you aware of this right at the beginning. She quotes a fee for the treatment, inclusive of all multiple sessions that may be required for completion of the treatment. 
3. Doesn't recommend further action until she is sure what is required (in my case, wait for all sessions of cleaning+polishing, before evaluating for cavities and further course of action)
4. Of course my experience with the actual treatment has also been good. 
I think with Meeta I have found a dentist who I can visit regularly. I would recommend her to everyone.
reply_text: Thank you Arjun. We appreciate the precious testimonial you have provided us and we really value your time and effort in writing this. Your kind words keep us motivated:)

review: I have tooth problem since childhood and I believe noone better than me can assess dental doctor better. For ages I have been. Switching dentist to find one who is honest, tells you the tal problem, takes ownership of patient and the treatment. Does not shrugs responsibility after treatment.  The search ended at Dr. meeta. She is qualified and honest.not into the business of minting money. She would recommend you the right solution irrespective of cost. Most of all she is considerate and patient while handling case. I was a tough one everytime but she was so gentle that I never hesitated to go to dentist after I met her.
reply_text: Thank You Mrs Deepti. Keep smiling always!!

review:
One of the best doctor visit experience ! 

I don't think I have met a better DR. than her. Extremely ethical with her work. Does not loot the patients depending on their pocket size (believe me, i have experienced dentist who loot customers depending on pocket size). 
Her knowledge in the field is vast and she shares every bit of information requirement in the 1st session with the easiest language understandable to the patient. 

Extremely friend and very soft spoken. 

We are def choosing her as our family dentist and strongly recommend her to our friends, family & readers. 

Thank you.
reply_text: Thank you Meet for writing such a wonderful and precious testimonial for us and we really value your time and effort in writing this. We look forward to welcome you and your family for any dental needs in the future as well.

review:
In one word - excellent !

She is technically sound and extremely warm. We have recently moved to this locality and were skeptical about visiting a new doctor but Dr Meeta, with all her warmth and patience, made sure that we were comfortable and that we understood the treatment plan that she was planning to take.

We have seen caring doctors but none as caring as her - she stayed in touch all throughout the weekend (and Sunday is an off day for her) and made sure that the patient was comfortable.

She truly personifies the statement "Doctors are God on earth" !
reply_text: Thank You Mrs Puja. Keep smiling always!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Malik is a thorough professional. It was easy to get an appointment at short notice, and the clinic is very conveniently located on Linking Road. Though I went for a basic teeth scaling, she was nice enough to spend a little more time with me and understand my dental history and give me some more dental care tips. So glad to have found such a doctor in Mumbai. Will definitely be going back.
reply_text: Thank you Ms. Shloka. It's our pleasure to have you as part of the Medident family of patients! Keep smiling

review: *** ***** *** ********** I had visited another dentist last week who told me to re-do all 3 crowns that I got done earlier saying that theres infection in all three. Although there was no pain or any other symptoms. Dr. Meeta put me at ease. Gave me an honest opinion. *** *** ******** I'm glad I took second opinion.
reply_text: Thank you Mrs. Rehana for your kind words. Keep Smiling always.

review: "Great experience, Extremely satisfied with the overall treatment. She is very confident with her approach, quite an expert as a Practitioner. Put the patient completely at ease and honest with her Profession.So, full satisfaction visiting her clinic and will surely recommend her to all my relatives and friends."
reply_text: Thanks a lot Mr Santu. Keep smiling always.

review:
A wonderful experience.
Dr Meeta is very punctual about her appointments, waiting time is almost zero, she is quite empathetic which makes her an awesome doctor.
She explains the diagnosis and treatment to the patient at length .
Unlike other doctors she is not greedy at all.
She  also establishes a personal rapport with the patient.
Highly recommended doctor......No second thoughts
reply_text: Thank You Mrs Abhilasha. Keep smiling always!!

review: Dr. Meeta is an excellent dentist. She will explain the complete procedure before starting the treatment with root cause of problem. reply_text: Thank You Mr. Amit. Keep smiling always!!

review: Dr. Meeta was extremely professional. All appointments started on time.  I had gone to her for a long persisting tooth issue and she took the time to explain the issue and the course of the treatment. Unlike other dentists who bombard with treatment and unnecessary meds, she gave it time to recover and did  what was required and was extremely patient. She also gave me the techniques I could use to avoid a similar issue cropping up in future which was very helpful. Would highly highly recommend her.

review: I went there because I had an ache in my wisdom tooth. I thought that it had to be removed. Turns out it wasn’t really necessary and it got resolved within 2 seating of deep cleaning. No need for unnecessary extraction. I was pleased with the experience. Would recommend her definitely. The interaction was very informative and I got a proper understanding of my problem. Unlike many doctors, who only give you only one option and push you towards it. She was friendly and helped solve all my doubts patiently and get to a better solution.

review: We had visited for RCT but doctor advised for Deep Cleaning saying that problem will get solved and we went for two sittings and paid fee *** **** ********* *** finally we had to go for RCT elsewhere ***** ****** *** ********
reply_text: Appreciate your feedback. As we had discussed in your first consultation, the best course of action at the time was deep cleaning as your symptoms involved pain across multiple teeth and gum bleeding. And in case the same did not work, then only to do root canal treatment( RCT). Our intention is always to try to save the tooth without conducting an invasive procedure like a RCT. Sorry if you felt dissatisfied with the recommended course but we had your best interest in mind. Happy to know you are pain free now and please do feel free to let us know if we can help in any way. Take care.
